The governor: s spokesperson, Rebecca Kelley, confirmed that the claim refers to the technical term "labor force," as advised by the Department of Labor economist.
The Department of Labor: s most recent labor force data, released on January 18, shows that Chittenden County's labor force had been declining until 2016 but has since been rebounding.
While the data suggests a decline in Chi: s labor force in previous years, it is unclear if the recent rebound is significant enough to refute the governor's claim. The final figures will be available in March.
